mapper.insert:
insert into nyt_address_info ( ID, CHANGE_FLAG, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_KIND, ACCEPT_TIMEDESC, PHONE, UUID, P_ID, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, REMARKS, IS_DELETE ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.changeFlag}, #{item.address}, #{item.addressKind}, #{item.acceptTimedesc}, #{item.phone}, #{item.uuid}, #{item.pId}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.remarks}, #{item.isDelete} )
